Pre-Game Insights: Australia is struggling in the World Cup with two consecutive losses.
Sri Lanka has also had a poor start to their campaign.
Travis Head is expected to join the World Cup squad after recovering from an injury.
Kusal Mendis will lead Sri Lanka due to Dasun Shanaka's injury.
Key player battles include David Warner vs Dunith Wellalage, Adam Zampa vs Kusal Mendis, and Mitchell Starc vs Sadeera Samarawickrama.
